TopicTitle: Mod Request: Unhiding of Sub-Assemblies-Button in VAB/SPH

Articles.Content:
Hey,

quite some time ago, the green sub-assemblies-button in the VAB/SPH was prominently displayed with the other categories. Then it was hidden by squad behind another click and this very useful tool was used less by players, many new players do not even know about it.

 

Can anyone please make a mod which puts this button below the main categories, as it used to be?

Thank you very much!
